alert.note: Alert for Aiken (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Aiken County through 730 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gloverville, or near Clearwater, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Clearwater, Aiken Mall, Belvedere, USC Aiken, Citizens Park, Gloverville, Graniteville, Burnettown, Hopeland Gardens, Redcliffe Plantation State Historic Site, Boyd Pond Park, and Vaucluse. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 6 and 20. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
